name: Spaced Out (Poop Dollar)
description:
SPACED OUT: a Game about Walking and Stuff

Featuring new hit single "Walkin On" by Edward Diggs.

What do you know? Who do you remember? Being shipwrecked on an alien planet and slowly losing your mind isn't such a great place to be. Maybe you could find some parts to fix your ship...

Controls: Move
Arrow Keys or WASD
ShootSpacebar
PausePRestart
RMuteM

*You will automatically shoot at the closest enemy

There are 3 ship parts on the map. Collect each one and then return to the ship to win.

*Tip: You can return to parts to resume their respective timers

This game was made in 48 hours for the game jam Minijam 102: Steam using the limitation of "Death isn't the End"

All assets are original made by me except for the sound effects.

Software used: Unity, Aseprite & Reason

Fun Facts:

  • My laptop overheated twice while making this game
  • The first build crashed on me three times
  • I crafted over 50 unique assets for this game
  • My trusty mouse of years died while finishing the song (Telling me "The song is finished!" XD)

Any donations would be greatly appreciated! ;)

*Devlog coming soon...

Twitter @ poopdollargames
